mapper.sql: id, eid, date, wages, divident, allowance, travel, award, costhour, status
mapper.select: select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from monthly_income t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from monthly_income t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from monthly_income where eid=#{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from monthly_income t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from monthly_income t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where em.fullname like "%"#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and t.status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from monthly_income t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where t.status=0 order by date desc
limit ${pageable.offset}, ${pageable.pageSize}
select count(*) from monthly_income where status=0

select t.*, em.id as emid,em.fullname as emname from monthly_income t left outer join employee em on t.eid=em.id where t.eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.date >= #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.date < #{etime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.status=0 order by date desc
mapper.insert: insert into monthly_income (id, eid, date, wages, divident, allowance, travel, award, costhour, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{wages,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{divident,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{allowance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{travel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{award,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{costhour,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into monthly_income
id,
eid,
date,
wages,
divident,
allowance,
travel,
award,
costhour,
status,

mapper.update:
update monthly_income
eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
wages = #{wages,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
divident = #{divident,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
allowance = #{allowance,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
travel = #{travel,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
award = #{award,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
costhour = #{costhour,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update monthly_income set eid = #{employee.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, wages = #{wages,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, divident = #{divident,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, allowance = #{allowance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, travel = #{travel,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, award = #{award,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, costhour = #{costhour,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
